name: wedding-photo-spot-launcher
description: AWS Lambda to launch EC2 spot instances for 500MB wedding video processing

scripts.deploy: npm install && zip -r lambda-deployment.zip . -x '*.git*' 'node_modules/.cache/*' && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name wedding-photo-spot-launcher --zip-file fileb://lambda-deployment.zip

author: Wedding Photo Processor
